website_summaries.verdict: A highly effective anti-aging cream. You will see noticeable results on your complexion almost instantly.

Has a smoothing effect on the skin and prevents wrinkles from forming or becoming worse

customer_reviews.title: I used it before bed but i loved the way my skin looked before going to bed ...
customer_reviews.text: I started using this about 6 months ago. I used it before bed but i loved the way my skin looked before going to bed so I decided to use it during the day also. I tried the daytime strivectin but it caused my skin to breakout. I've had tons of compliments on my skin since I started using it. My skin looks hydrated and smooth and my skin tone is even so I don't feel the need to wear makeup. i wish it was a little cheaper but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frickin' Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Long time smoker and surfer + fair skin = some major damage. Using this for 10 days and it works so well that my only regret is not starting sooner. I look - not lying - a year younger in just over a week. I am not sure if it is just one of those creams that plumps the areas in need and so make the skin smoother but it really does work. Side note: Was supposed to get a $25 cert for this purchase to apply towards future purchase... anyone reading who can help, that would be great.
